NAME: REAL_GENOTYPE
DESCRIPTION: Actual genotype implemented on the platform (NA is for blank plots)

NAME: GENOTYPE
DESCRIPTION: Planned genotype in the experimental design

NAME: FRESH_LS
DESCRIPTION: Fresh weight of the leaf system (LS)

NAME: FRESH_RS
DESCRIPTION: Fresh weight of the root system (RS)

NAME: DRY_LS
DESCRIPTION: Dry weight of the leaf system (LS)

NAME: DRY_RS
DESCRIPTION: Dry weight of the root system (RS)
